title: Surprise! (CRE215)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the fifteenth episode of our second season, Brett Gelman, Gabe Liedman, Margot Leitman, Kathy Salerno and Squirrely share stories of unexpected and tumultuous circumstances, and their reactions under pressure.

 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Brett Gelman, Gabe Liedman, Margot Leitman, Kathy Salerno, Jacob D. Cox, David Crabb, Friday Mile, Marshall York)
